text: int main ( void ) { int n ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; for ( int i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { long long int k ; scanf ( "%lld" , & k ) ; long long int a [ k ] ; int f = 0 , count = k ; for ( int j = 0 ; j < k ; j ++ ) scanf ( "%lld" , & a [ j ] ) ; for ( int j = 0 ; j < k ; j ++ ) { int s = j ; while ( a [ s + 1 ] >= a [ s ] && s < k - 1 ) { count ++ ; s ++ ; } } printf ( "%d\n" , count ) ; } return 0 ; }
